name: Durate
headline: We build automated scheduling software for hospitals
description: We make software to automate call shift scheduling for hospital residents/faculty and generally help hospital administrators keep track of their departments. Hospitals have long lists of requirements and rules they must follow, leading administrators to spend hundreds of hours a month ensuring their departments adhere to guidelines.

founders.name: Michael Mounajjed, Founder, CEO
founders.description: Rice CS / Applied Math dropout now building automation software for hospital administrators at Durate

founders.name: Benjamin Liu, Founder
founders.description: Ex-Rice CS, building software to help hospitals automate hundreds of hours of administrative tasks

# Physician scheduling,simplified.
Durate automates scheduling and admin work so you can focus on delivering incredible care.
See a demo
## Trusted at leading hospitals
![Durate Logos 1](https://wb3bqfeinngqlquc.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/heroSection/image%2026%20\(1\)-ChZ6zKTt5uLZsXQWq9AzgVMqtsv04z.png)![Durate Logos 2](https://wb3bqfeinngqlquc.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/heroSection/image%2030-d9bKBJt8hUpzcZlXE7zhkftdNiyCz2.png)![Durate Logos 3](https://wb3bqfeinngqlquc.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/heroSection/image%2027%20\(1\)-c8FhSGL9ffWaZFTih0ny5o5yQPAeba.png)![Durate Logos 4](https://wb3bqfeinngqlquc.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/heroSection/Frame%2017%20\(5\)-5kE5e1K8d2K4b5jC11a0NsigQqu6Oq.png)
![OneLeet Badge](https://badges.oneleet.com/badge/6732a06b-8376-4087-bab8-a2494d576e95?dark=false)
## More about what Durate does
## We automate scheduling and coverage for physicians
Durate not only helps complete admin work like scheduling for you, but it's able to combine all your information in one place by doing the following:
![Product screenshot](https://wb3bqfeinngqlquc.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/infoSections/Screenshot%202025-01-13%20210047-4Bxb1utGSRNnMjGLIyeoEAmOWlT6XZ.jpg)
Scheduling.
    Automated, equitable, and syncing right to your calendar so you don't have any last minute unwelcomed suprises.
Integrations.
    We offer dozens of integrations so you never have to worry about copy and pasting or falling behind.
Management.
    Need to switch a shift? pick up an additional shift? or just want to see who is working a rotation? We got you.
## What features Durate offers
### Effortless organization
## We help turn the chaos into clarity
## Scheduling
Automate your scheduling with AI to fix coverage gaps
![Scheduling](https://wb3bqfeinngqlquc.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/infoSections/tile1%20\(2\)-upzgVvXKWvoA9Hc12x21wcZaSzeMzC.png)
## Payroll
Link your payroll directly to ensure accuracy
![Payroll Frame 1](https://wb3bqfeinngqlquc.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/infoSections/Frame%201-gPC30jLvD765EdGRRFgbNMkXn6PAdP.png)![Payroll Frame 2](https://wb3bqfeinngqlquc.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/infoSections/Frame%202-2HpTlH2bMbMlyR6t9MryWQVlRaRbOR.png)![Payroll Frame 3](https://wb3bqfeinngqlquc.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/infoSections/Frame%203-xEfJxSfwdeQlPPcxcMHc8pALienXJM.png)
## Management
See trends and dozens of data points all in one place
![Management](https://wb3bqfeinngqlquc.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/general/tile3-3Xb6oC3MEta9egt1yU68cAshU15Ltr)
## Here are some of our specialties
### [Anesthesiology](https://www.durate.com/</specialties/anesthesiology>)
### [Cardiology](https://www.durate.com/</specialties/cardiology>)
### [Emergency Medicine](https://www.durate.com/</specialties/emergency-medicine>)
### [OBGYN](https://www.durate.com/</specialties/obgyn>)
### [Radiology](https://www.durate.com/</specialties/radiology>)
### [Urgent Care](https://www.durate.com/</specialties/urgent-care>)
#### Some more options
Dermatology
Neurology
Psychiatry
Orthopedics
Pediatrics
Ophthalmology
Oncology
Hematology
Nephrology
Endocrinology
Pulmonology
Infectious Disease
Pathology
Sports Medicine
Plastic Surgery
[20+ more specialties](https://www.durate.com/</specialties/other>)

## Frequently Asked Questions
### What type of healthcare providers can use this?
### What if my scheduling is too complicated?
### What types of integrations are available?
## Interested in learning more about Durate?
See a demo

generated_description:
**Durate: Automating Hospital Scheduling**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch F24, Durate is a promising startup focused on revolutionizing the way hospitals manage scheduling. They’ve honed in on a critical pain point for healthcare providers, creating software that simplifies and automates call shift scheduling for hospital residents and faculty. With a small yet dedicated team of three based in an undisclosed location, Durate is positioned to make a significant impact in the healthcare IT sector.

### The Problem They Solve

Hospitals are often bogged down by complex scheduling requirements and guidelines that drain the time and resources of administrators. The inefficiency in traditional scheduling methods leads to hundreds of hours wasted each month. Durate aims to relieve this burden by offering a smarter, automated approach.

### Key Features of Durate

1. **Automated Scheduling**: Utilizing AI, Durate provides a seamless scheduling process that syncs directly with calendars, eliminating last-minute surprises and scheduling headaches.
  
2. **Integrations**: The platform offers numerous integrations, allowing for a holistic view and management of data, which reduces the need for tedious copy-pasting.

3. **Comprehensive Management**: Durate’s tools enable administrators to easily manage shifts, view rotations, and make real-time adjustments without hassle.

4. **Payroll Linking**: Direct payroll integrations ensure that scheduling accuracy translates to financial accuracy, a crucial element for any hospital.

5. **Data Insights**: The system compiles extensive data points, helping hospitals make informed decisions based on scheduling trends.

### Specialties Catered to

Durate isn't limited to just one department; it caters to a wide range of specialties, including but not limited to:
- Anesthesiology
- Cardiology
- Emergency Medicine
- OBGYN
- Radiology
- Urgent Care

There's a strong focus on ensuring that nearly every specialty can utilize their features effectively.

### The Bigger Picture

By automating the scheduling process, Durate doesn't just aim to simplify the lives of hospital administrators; they want healthcare providers to focus on what truly matters—delivering high-quality patient care. Backed by Y Combinator, and with strong initial traction, Durate is positioned not just to survive but to thrive in a critical sector of the economy.

If you’re curious about how Durate can transform scheduling at your facility, you can explore their offerings or see a demo at [Durate’s website](https://www.durate.com/).

In the healthcare landscape, where efficiency is paramount, Durate is carving out a niche that could well define the future of hospital administration.
